type.name: CollectOptions
type.desc: Options when collecting data into a catchment. They can extend `Writable` options which will be passed to the `Catchment` constructor.
type.prop: Whether to return a raw buffer instead of a string. The string is created by joining all incoming chunks together with `.join('')` method.

Sets whether an error emitted by the stream with have its stack start at the line where the `collect` was called rather than inside of the stream. In other words, hides the implementation of the stream.
